parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Displays an object defined in the global config in CfgTitles.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>For greater efficiency and ease of modability it is recommended to use named layers with [[#Alternative_Syntax_2|Alternative Syntax 2]].</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[cutObj]] [class, type, speed, showInMap]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [class, type, speed, showInMap]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - the className of the object defined in <tt>[[configFile]] >> "CfgTitles" >> class</tt>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> type: [[String]] one of "PLAIN", "PLAIN DOWN", "BLACK", "BLACK FADED", "BLACK OUT", "BLACK IN", "WHITE OUT" and "WHITE IN". See [[Title Effect Type]]s for more information about these values.

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> speed (Optional): [[Number]] - Time in seconds to fade in resource. Default: -1

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> showInMap (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[false]] to hide the text when the map is opened. Default: [[true]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> layer [[cutObj]] [class, type, speed, showInMap]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> layer: [[Number]] - layer number on which the effect is shown, where 0 is the back most. Layer number is rounded to the nearest integer and also cannot be negative. Layer 99.5 will be treated as layer 100.

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [class, type, speed, showInMap]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - the className of the object defined in <tt>[[configFile]] >> "CfgTitles" >> class</tt>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> type: [[String]] one of "PLAIN", "PLAIN DOWN", "BLACK", "BLACK FADED", "BLACK OUT", "BLACK IN", "WHITE OUT" and "WHITE IN". See [[Title Effect Type]]s for more information about these values.

</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> speed: [[Number]] - (Optional, default -1) Time in seconds to fade in resource.

</value></part><part><name>p26</name>=<value> showInMap: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[true]]) [[false]] to hide the text when the map is opened.

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value> layerName [[cutObj]] [class, type, speed, showInMap] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.57.134673</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value> layerName: [[String]] - layer name on which the effect is shown. Layer names are CaSe SeNsItIvE

</value></part><part><name>p42</name>=<value> [class, type, speed, showInMap]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p43</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - the className of the object defined in <tt>[[configFile]] >> "CfgTitles" >> class</tt>

</value></part><part><name>p44</name>=<value> type: [[String]] one of "PLAIN", "PLAIN DOWN", "BLACK", "BLACK FADED", "BLACK OUT", "BLACK IN", "WHITE OUT" and "WHITE IN". See [[Title Effect Type]]s for more information about these values.

</value></part><part><name>p45</name>=<value> speed (Optional): [[Number]] - Time in seconds to fade in resource. Default: -1

</value></part><part><name>p46</name>=<value> showInMap (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[false]] to hide the text when the map is opened. Default: [[true]]

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Number]] - number of the allocated layer
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[cutObj]] ["TVSet", "PLAIN"];
[[cutObj]] ["TVSet", "PLAIN", 2]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>2 [[cutObj]] ["Sphere", "PLAIN"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _layer = "layer1" [[cutObj]] ["BISLogo", "PLAIN"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allCutLayers]], [[titleObj]], [[cutText]], [[cutRsc]], [[cutFadeOut]], [[allActiveTitleEffects]]
</value></part></template>
